events.name: Israeli strike on ambulance in Gaza
events.wd_label: Israeli strike on ambulance in Gaza
events.wd_description: An Israeli strike on an ambulance outside Gaza City's largest hospital killed at least 15 people, with Israel claiming the ambulance was used by Hamas operatives.
events.description: An Israeli strike on an ambulance outside Gaza City's largest hospital killed at least 15 people, with Israel claiming the ambulance was used by Hamas operatives.

events.name: Ambulance strike
events.wd_description: The Palestinian Red Crescent confirmed that an Israeli strike on an ambulance outside Al-Shifa Hospital killed at least 15 people.
events.description: The Palestinian Red Crescent confirmed that an Israeli strike on an ambulance outside Al-Shifa Hospital killed at least 15 people.

events.name: Convoy attack
events.wd_description: The Hamas government reported that the convoy of ambulances transporting the wounded was struck twice, once 1km away and again outside the hospital gate.
events.description: The Hamas government reported that the convoy of ambulances transporting the wounded was struck twice, once 1km away and again outside the hospital gate.

events.name: Wounded evacuation
events.wd_description: Only 17 Palestinians wounded were evacuated to an Egyptian hospital, instead of the originally planned 28, according to the Ministry of Health in Egypt.
events.description: Only 17 Palestinians wounded were evacuated to an Egyptian hospital, instead of the originally planned 28, according to the Ministry of Health in Egypt.

events.name: Diplomatic tensions between India and Canada
events.wd_label: Diplomatic tensions between India and Canada
events.wd_description: India has directed Canada to withdraw close to 40 diplomatic staff and confirmed those who stayed past October 10 would lose their diplomatic immunity.
events.description: India has directed Canada to withdraw close to 40 diplomatic staff and confirmed those who stayed past October 10 would lose their diplomatic immunity.

events.name: Diplomatic staff withdrawal
events.wd_description: India has instructed Canada to withdraw nearly 40 diplomatic staff from the country, with a deadline of October 10 for maintaining diplomatic immunity.
events.description: India has instructed Canada to withdraw nearly 40 diplomatic staff from the country, with a deadline of October 10 for maintaining diplomatic immunity.

events.name: Allegations of involvement in killing
events.wd_description: Canada accused India of involvement in the killing of Sikh separatist leader Hardeep Singh Nijjar on Canadian soil, an allegation denied by India.
events.description: Canada accused India of involvement in the killing of Sikh separatist leader Hardeep Singh Nijjar on Canadian soil, an allegation denied by India.

events.name: Trudeau's response
events.wd_description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau stated that he does not plan to escalate the rift with India and emphasized ongoing responsible and constructive engagement.
events.description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau stated that he does not plan to escalate the rift with India and emphasized ongoing responsible and constructive engagement.

events.name: Devastating wildfires in Canada in 2023
events.wd_description: The 2023 wildfires in Canada, exacerbated by the climate crisis, consumed a record 45.7 million acres of boreal forests, with far-reaching effects that extended beyond Canada’s borders.
events.description: The 2023 wildfires in Canada, exacerbated by the climate crisis, consumed a record 45.7 million acres of boreal forests, with far-reaching effects that extended beyond Canada’s borders.

events.name: Climate crisis impact on wildfires
events.wd_description: The climate crisis has intensified and increased the size of wildfires in Canada through altered precipitation patterns and elevated temperatures.
events.description: The climate crisis has intensified and increased the size of wildfires in Canada through altered precipitation patterns and elevated temperatures.

events.name: Destruction of boreal forests
events.wd_description: The wildfires consumed 45.7 million acres of boreal forests, threatening vital carbon storage and species habitats, with uncertainty surrounding the recovery of fir and spruce trees.
events.description: The wildfires consumed 45.7 million acres of boreal forests, threatening vital carbon storage and species habitats, with uncertainty surrounding the recovery of fir and spruce trees.

events.name: Smoke impact beyond Canada
events.wd_description: The wildfire smoke spread beyond Canada, creating dystopian conditions in New York City and hazy skies in Florida, demonstrating the far-reaching impact of the fires.
events.description: The wildfire smoke spread beyond Canada, creating dystopian conditions in New York City and hazy skies in Florida, demonstrating the far-reaching impact of the fires.

events.name: Labor Requirements in EV Manufacturing
events.wd_description: The labor requirements in electric vehicle (EV) manufacturing are being scrutinized, with studies suggesting that EVs may not require significantly less labor than traditional gasoline cars.
events.description: The labor requirements in electric vehicle (EV) manufacturing are being scrutinized, with studies suggesting that EVs may not require significantly less labor than traditional gasoline cars.

events.name: Labor Comparison Studies
events.wd_description: Several studies and experts argue that the labor savings in EV manufacturing compared to gasoline cars have been overstated.
events.description: Several studies and experts argue that the labor savings in EV manufacturing compared to gasoline cars have been overstated.

events.name: t: Carnegie Mellon Study
events.wd_description: The study from Carnegie Mellon University suggests that making the powertrain of electric vehicles requires more total labor than making engines and transmissions for gasoline cars.
events.description: The study from Carnegie Mellon University suggests that making the powertrain of electric vehicles requires more total labor than making engines and transmissions for gasoline cars.

events.name: t: Boston Consulting Group Study
events.wd_description: The Boston Consulting Group found that manufacturing a complete electric vehicle requires only slightly less labor than making a gasoline-powered car.
events.description: The Boston Consulting Group found that manufacturing a complete electric vehicle requires only slightly less labor than making a gasoline-powered car.

events.name: Battery Manufacturing Labor
events.wd_description: The production of battery packs, particularly battery cells, requires a significant amount of labor, contributing to the labor requirements in EV manufacturing.
events.description: The production of battery packs, particularly battery cells, requires a significant amount of labor, contributing to the labor requirements in EV manufacturing.

events.name: t: Battery Cell Production
events.wd_description: Making battery cells takes up a substantial portion of the labor hours involved in EV manufacturing.
events.description: Making battery cells takes up a substantial portion of the labor hours involved in EV manufacturing.

events.name: t: Automation and Labor
events.wd_description: Although battery manufacturing is highly automated, there is still a considerable amount of work for people in managing equipment, quality checks, and other tasks.
events.description: Although battery manufacturing is highly automated, there is still a considerable amount of work for people in managing equipment, quality checks, and other tasks.

events.name: Other EV Manufacturing Labor
events.wd_description: Manufacturing the rest of the electric vehicle, including high voltage wiring systems, chargers, and lightweight materials, also requires significant labor.
events.description: Manufacturing the rest of the electric vehicle, including high voltage wiring systems, chargers, and lightweight materials, also requires significant labor.

events.name: t: Final Assembly Labor
events.wd_description: The final assembly stage of building an EV, where components are brought together to make a final vehicle, actually takes somewhat more work than a gasoline-powered car.
events.description: The final assembly stage of building an EV, where components are brought together to make a final vehicle, actually takes somewhat more work than a gasoline-powered car.

events.name: t: Specialized Materials
events.wd_description: Workers need to handle materials like aluminum and composites, which can be more difficult to work with than traditional steel.
events.description: Workers need to handle materials like aluminum and composites, which can be more difficult to work with than traditional steel.
